title: React Native Music Application
description: This is a music application that I created using React Native. It has a simple UI and it can play music from the device.

title: Recreated Twitter partly using MongoDB
description: This is a Twitter clone that I created using MongoDB and NodeJS. It has a simple UI and it can post tweets.

title: AMW Veranda
description: This is a website that I created for a client. It is a simple website that has a contact form.

title: Note App with EJS
description: This is a note application that I created using EJS and NodeJS. It has a simple UI and it can add, edit, and delete notes. It also has a text on image recognition feature.

title: First version of my portfolio
description: This is the first version of my portfolio that I created using VueJS. It has a simple UI
